name: Cow Whispers
description:
Cows like playing games. Cows like moo-conversations. Cows like Chinese whispers. Cow Whispers is a game about moo-transmission. The players responsibility is to help the flock in cowmunication, by appropriate placement of phone receivers-transmitters. Each cow will translate the lowing to human words which will have to be sorted to form a sentence. 

Double click to place phone.

Hold left click to move phone.

Hold left and right click to rotate phone.

Press space to send moo signal.

Game created on Łódzki Game Jam 5
